Articles.Content: Share your opinions do you prefer curse or the spaceport let us know!

1. this should be a poll

2. your poll should include a third commuinity backed option, as that has some support behind it

3. it doesnt matter as a mod will come in to play damage control, locking or merging this thread while wearing a "WE <3 CURSE" t-shirt.

EDIT: oh its a poll now. nice

We have a thread for all curse-related discussion here: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79011-The-Curse-Thread

I suggest that if you want to run a poll you use strawpoll, like a few other members did (eg: http://strawpoll.me/1650297/r). Also, coming from a scientific standpoint you might want to consider bringing a little more structure into your poll then.

This thread is closed.
